SEARCH
Package app.apollo.server

Interface FileMetadataDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
DBFileMetadataDAO
public interface FileMetadataDAO
Data Access Object (DAO) interface for managing file metadata. Provides methods to insert, update, delete, and query metadata entries.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    delete(String filename, Integer ownerId)
    Deletes the metadata record for a file owned by a specific user.
    FileMetadata
    findByNameAndOwner(String filename, Integer ownerId)
    Finds metadata for a file by filename and owner ID.
    List<FileMetadata>
    findByOwnerId(Integer userId)
    Finds all file metadata entries belonging to a specific user.
    boolean
    insert(FileMetadata metadata)
    Inserts a new file metadata record into the data store.
    boolean
    update(FileMetadata metadata)
    Updates an existing file metadata record.

  • Method Details

    • insert

      boolean insert(FileMetadata metadata)
      Inserts a new file metadata record into the data store.
      Parameters:
      metadata - The file metadata to insert.
      Returns:
      true if insertion was successful, false otherwise.

    • update

      boolean update(FileMetadata metadata)
      Updates an existing file metadata record.
      Parameters:
      metadata - The updated file metadata.
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false otherwise.

    • delete

      void delete(String filename, Integer ownerId)
      Deletes the metadata record for a file owned by a specific user.
      Parameters:
      filename - The name of the file.
      ownerId - The ID of the owner of the file.

    • findByOwnerId

      List<FileMetadata> findByOwnerId(Integer userId)
      Finds all file metadata entries belonging to a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The user ID.
      Returns:
      List of FileMetadata objects owned by the user.

    • findByNameAndOwner

      FileMetadata findByNameAndOwner(String filename, Integer ownerId)
      Finds metadata for a file by filename and owner ID.
      Parameters:
      filename - The name of the file.
      ownerId - The ID of the owner.
      Returns:
      The FileMetadata matching the filename and owner, or null if none found.
